dt: {bc}a person who conducts business or household affairs

dt.t: He was promoted to {wi}manager{/wi} last month.

dt: {bc}a person whose work or profession is {d_link|management|management}
{bc}a person who directs a team or athlete
{bc}a student who in scholastic or collegiate sports supervises equipment and records under the direction of a coach

shortdef: a person who conducts business or household affairs
a person whose work or profession is management

dt: {bc}an official employed by an elected council to direct the administration of a city government

shortdef: an official employed by an elected council to direct the administration of a city government

dt: {bc}to {d_link|manage|manage:1} (someone or something) with one or more other people

dt.t: He {wi}comanages{/wi} the restaurant with his sister.
If there's one thing that's harder than managing your own money it's this: {wi}co-managing{/wi} money with a romantic partner.

utxt.t: … he settled on a {wi}comanagement{/wi} approach, working side by side with school systems—and preferably unions, too—in hiring and management.
… they brought Ann Richards in as campaign adviser and {wi}co-manager{/wi}.

shortdef: to manage (someone or something) with one or more other people : to manage together

dt: {bc}a person who directs something from the floor (as of a nominating convention)

shortdef: a person who directs something from the floor (as of a nominating convention)

dt: {bc}management personnel intermediate between operational supervisors and policy-making administrators

shortdef: management personnel intermediate between operational supervisors and policy-making administrators

dt: {bc}one who supervises the physical aspects of a stage production, assists the director during rehearsals, and is in charge of the stage during a performance

shortdef: one who supervises the physical aspects of a stage production, assists the director during rehearsals, and is in charge of the stage during a performance

dt: {bc}an official appointed to direct the administration of a town government

shortdef: an official appointed to direct the administration of a town government
